about_the_game:
Hello! I'm Gina, director and representative of T.P.S. We're looking for skilled operators who can handle our cutting-edge support technology. Everything is set for the demo.

Now, you might be wondering—what exactly is this demo? Well, let’s just say it’s a series of tests designed to teach you how to use our technology. You'll have between 15 and 35 minutes to complete them all, and at the end, your performance will be thoroughly evaluated.

The real question is… Do you have what it takes to pass?

What is T.P.S.?

The Pet Squad is a 2D strategy and puzzle game with pixel art aesthetics, mainly inspired by Lemmings, that puts you in the role of a support operator.

The game is set in the not-too-distant future, where humans have managed to artificially evolve animals. The pet squad SLU is an organization responsible for maintaining order between humans and the evolved animals, known as Animanos.

As an operator, you will have to support your squad at all times, guide them along the correct path, and protect them from enemies or themselves. To achieve this, you will have access to the most advanced technology, allowing you to teleport objects and even slow down time.

Think about how to help your squad and use the objects to achieve the goal.

Keep in mind that there are multiple interactions between objects.

Gather your squad of pets to solve cases and complete missions. Keep in mind that each one has different abilities.

Collect clues to help you advance in the cases. Earn Dogecoins to train your squad and improve the technology.

Rescue captured animals; some will want to join the squad.
